ComicInfo.Summary: Schaefer and Rasche are reunited at last, but it's just in time to fight the battle of their lives! It's all-out war against the Predator army, and since the army and police want Schaefer and Rasche out of the way--the two must turn to one of their enemies for the manpower they need! Will anyone--or anything-- be left standing when the smoke clears?
